root.name: Gundam Assault Survive
root.description: OverviewGundam Assault Survive is the successor of the Gundam Battle PSP series which has not seen a new entry since Gundam Battle Universe. Unlike its predecessors, which focused exclusively on Gundam's early Universal Century timeline, it now expands to include alternate universes. Scenarios-One Year War (UC 0079): Mobile Suit Gundam and related sidestories Factions: Earth Federation, Principality of Zeon -Operation Stardust (UC 0083): Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memories Factions: Earth Federation, Principality of Zeon -Gryps Conflict (UC 0087): Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Factions: AEUG, Titans-First Neo-Zeon War (UC 0088): Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ, Mobile Suit Gundam Sentinel Factions: AEUG, Neo Zeon -Second Neo-Zeon War (UC 0093): Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Factions: Londo Bell, Neo Zeon -Cosmo Babylonian War (UC 0123): Mobile Suit Gundam F91 (new) Factions: Earth Federation, Crossbone Vanguard -Bloody Valentine War (CE 70): Mobile Suit Gundam SEED (new) Factions: Earth Alliance, ZAFT -Celestial Being Armed Interventions (AD 2307): Mobile Suit Gundam 00 (first season) (new) Factions: Celestial Being, United Nations Forces Series included, but not given campaign scenarios include Mobile Suit Victory Gundam and Mobile Suit Gundam: Hathaway's Flash. OperatorsAnn Friberg ( MS Sensen 0079)Ellen Rochefil ( Climax U.C.)Noel Anderson ( Lost War Chronicles)Hoa Blanchett ( MS Sensen 0079)Miyu Takizawa ( From Place Beyond the Blaze)Yuuki Nakasato (Lost War Chronicles)Female Soldier (The 08th MS Team)Charlotte Hepner ( Zeonic Front)Maureen Kitamura ( The Blue Destiny) New FeaturesThe player now has two squadmates as opposed to one."True" Create-a-Character is implemented for the first time.
